verses.name: 2 Peter 3:1
verses.text: This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:

verses.name: 2 Peter 3:2
verses.text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets, and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour:

verses.name: 2 Peter 3:3
verses.text: Knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts,

verses.name: 2 Peter 3:4
verses.text: And saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation.
